trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around June 18th 2008
divs: sighting detailsmy number is(818) 903-9354 the sphere was red, silver, and invisible. it changed altitude and direction at will, it was at about 1000 to 3000 feet, it was small although scale was hard to determine having worked with aircraft in the past the sphere was about 30ft in diameter, it was heading south along the 134fwy in north hollywood on 6\18\2008 at 5:50 pm on wednesday. let me know where more info on this craft can be found because of the distance of the sphere i cannot say if it was a black budget craft or an true ufo, but my guess is that it is a true ufo. thank you in advance for any info you may have about this sphere, more data about the sphere is at the website ufosnw.com thanks again. david :)
